mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECIPE_VIEW_LIST (VIEWS_NO, RECIPE_ID, MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY) VALUES (RECIPE_VIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{recipeId}, #{memberId}, #{category} )

INSERT INTO RECIPE_VIEWS (RECIPE_ID, VIEWS) SELECT RECIPE_ID, COUNT(*) AS VIEWS FROM RECIPE_VIEW_LIST GROUP BY RECIPE_ID HAVING NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM RECIPE_VIEWS rv WHERE rv.RECIPE_ID = RECIPE_VIEW_LIST.RECIPE_ID )

INSERT INTO RECIPE_CATEGORY_VIEWS (MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY, VIEWS) SELECT MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY, COUNT(*) AS VIEWS FROM RECIPE_VIEW_LIST WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM RECIPE_CATEGORY_VIEWS rcv WHERE rcv.MEMBER_ID = RECIPE_VIEW_LIST.MEMBER_ID AND rcv.CATEGORY = RECIPE_VIEW_LIST.CATEGORY ) GROUP BY MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY
mapper.update: UPDATE RECIPE_VIEWS SET RECIPE_VIEWS.VIEWS = COALESCE(RECIPE_VIEWS.VIEWS, 0) + ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE_VIEW_LIST WHERE RECIPE_VIEW_LIST.RECIPE_ID= RECIPE_VIEWS.RECIPE_ID )

UPDATE RECIPE_CATEGORY_VIEWS SET RECIPE_CATEGORY_VIEWS.VIEWS = COALESCE(RECIPE_CATEGORY_VIEWS.VIEWS, 0) + ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE_VIEW_LIST WHERE RECIPE_VIEW_LIST.MEMBER_ID = RECIPE_CATEGORY_VIEWS.MEMBER_ID AND RECIPE_VIEW_LIST.CATEGORY = RECIPE_CATEGORY_VIEWS.CATEGORY )
